platform_description.title: Rosokh: Islamic Multimedia Platform
platform_description.description: Rosokh is an innovative Islamic platform delivering a comprehensive digital experience for Quran recitation, audio, video, and interactive games. Designed to be ultra-fast, completely free, and trilingual (Arabic, English, Russian), it features a Hijri calendar, Khatma tracking, and an analytics dashboard. Built with a modern, green-tosca geometric design and zero heavy dependencies, Rosokh ensures high performance and accessibility across all devices.
